PMR fell by 17%, from 39.3 perinatal deaths 
per 1,000 live births at baseline to 32.7 per

from 37.9 to 32.8 perinatal deaths per 1,000.
Decrease in the Stillbirth Rate in Facilities: 
Both Uganda and Zambia showed comparable 
declines in total stillbirth rates (20% and 19%, 
respectively). In Uganda, the intrapartum 
stillbirth rate declined by 28% (from 22.4
